original_text: When people serve God as their king, they have God's power. They do not just speak proud words.
korean_text: 하나님의 나라는 말에 있지 아니하고 오직 능력에 있음이라

sentences.original_text: When people serve God as their king
They do not just speak proud words
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 단지 교만한 말만 하지 않습니다
